description: RabbitMQ abstractions are hosted within the Windows Service.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are assigned to the same developer.

description: The Login UI requires the Authentication Service to function.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mocked IAuthenticationService interface until the concrete implementation is ready.
impact_if_delayed: Login screen cannot be fully tested.

description: The DICOM texture pipeline depends on a stable DirectX host control from the prototype spike.
mitigation_plan: The spike in Sprint 1 is the mitigation. If it fails, a contingency plan (e.g., pivot to SkiaSharp) will be activated.
impact_if_delayed: The entire DICOM viewer epic is blocked.

description: The print submission workflow must use the Named Pipe IPC to check service status.
